pullrequest.title: Logging Part 1: Misc changes to ignition transport

content.raw:
I'm noticing that the tests on Windows and Homebrew have some very surprising logic failures.

If they were performance/timing failures, I wouldn't have been surprised, but things like `counter` being wrong would normally indicate logical failures. It's especially strange because these failures seem to be inconsistent between the two, and Xenial has no failures at all.

I'm going to run tests on my Windows virtual machine before reapproving this PR.
content.html:
I'm noticing that the tests on Windows and Homebrew have some very surprising logic failures.

If they were performance/timing failures, I wouldn't have been surprised, but things like counter being wrong would normally indicate logical failures. It's especially strange because these failures seem to be inconsistent between the two, and Xenial has no failures at all.

I'm going to run tests on my Windows virtual machine before reapproving this PR.
